---
category: news
title: "Portsmouth: AI used to help preserve HMS Victory"
excerpt: "Artificial Intelligence (AI) is being used to help preserve part of Vice-Admiral Lord Nelson's flagship HMS Victory. Based in Portsmouth's Historic Dockyard, the warship is undergoing a 10-year conservation scheme. University of Southampton students have applied AI technology to thousands of images taken of the 259-year-old ship."
